home.intro: This application demonstrates third-party Flutter localization using easy_localization and JSON files. Explore different screens to experience multilingual support in action.

detail.long_paragraph: This premium product features exceptional quality and craftsmanship. Designed with attention to detail, it offers outstanding performance and durability. Perfect for both professional and personal use, this item represents the perfect balance between functionality and style.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize your app experience
settings.info: Configure your application preferences. Change language, adjust display settings, manage notifications, and customize your experience.
settings.notifications_subtitle: Receive updates about new features, important announcements, and personalized content recommendations.
settings.biometric_subtitle: Use fingerprint or face recognition to secure your app.
settings.auto_sync_subtitle: Automatically sync your data across all devices.

about.title: Localization Research Project
about.overview: This application is part of a comprehensive research project comparing different localization methods in Flutter. This prototype demonstrates a third-party localization system using easy_localization and JSON language files. The application supports multiple languages and showcases practical internationalization in modern mobile applications.
about.stack_body: Built with Flutter framework using easy_localization. Localization strings are managed through JSON language files, enabling runtime language switching and a flexible developer workflow.
about.flutter_sdk_subtitle: Latest stable version with Material 3 design
about.feature_multilang_desc: Full support for English, Sinhala, and Tamil languages with comprehensive string coverage
about.feature_runtime_desc: Seamless language switching without app restart
about.feature_flexible_desc: Translations stored as JSON files for easy updates and management
about.feature_coverage_desc: All UI elements and content are fully localized
about.feature_perf_desc: Measures runtime overhead under controlled scenarios
